thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 46 of 522
thread.title: Colleen

author: Colleen
title: Colleen
text:
>The VIP experience is great as you are offered outfits at discounted cost. It would be better, if individual pieces were available at this discount.
>The site is easy to use but the added magazine subscriptions are bothersome and almost impossible to cancel.
>Materials used could use an upgrade. Materials used by competitors at the same prices have gone up but fabletics has stayed the same. So much so that I'm willing to pay more and stop the monthly payment to fabletics to buy my work out gear elsewhere.
>I do love that you can get an outfit for $49. Its great that it is accessible to so many, but now I have a bunch of outfits and don't really need to keep subscribing.
